ALTER TABLE `trans_types` ADD `url` VARCHAR( 128 ) CHARACTER SET ascii COLLATE ascii_bin NULL AFTER `typename`;
DROP VIEW `trans_view_types`;
create view trans_view_types as
select `b`.`hostname` AS `hostname`,`b`.`sitename` AS `sitename`,`a`.* from (`trans_types` `a` join `trans_sites` `b`) where (`a`.`siteid` = `b`.`id`);
